/QuickLinks.aspx
  1. Recent News
  2. Calendar
  1. Recent News

  1. Terrace Heights Development Update

    Yakima County Public Services staff led a discussion on future development by private and public entities on April 11th at the Terrace Heights Community Meeting. To view the material handed out at the meeting please click here. Additional Info...

  2. Motorist Advisory -- Effective immediately -- Maple Ave Closed for Bridge and Utility Work

    Maple Ave will be closed starting at Maple Court and continuing to Hillcrest Drive effectively immediately until further notice, due to bridgework and utility work in the area. Expect additional travel time as you utilize the Hillcrest Drive detour.

  3. East West Corridor Open House

    This open house will provide an opportunity to discuss the phasing and design of the East-West Corridor Project. City, County and project team representatives will be present to answer questions. Read on...
View All News
